      Iterable<Point> RegionLabeling.getRegionPoints(RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion r)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is not supported any longer. Instead use Iterable<Point> capability of RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion to iterate directly over region points.
